item.title: Crowdsourcing In Lieu of Outsourcing
item.description:
Over recent years, outsourcing has become increasingly popular as a way to meet business needs. However, since the Great Recession, crowdsourcing has emerged as a new and growing trend. This approach leverages the collective talent of a group to find solutions for specific tasks. Crowdsourcing provides a decentralized approach to problem-solving, unlike traditional methods of assigning tasks to employees or contractors. Imagine needing a building sold â€“ you’d hire a real estate agent...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/crowdsourcing-in-lieu-of-outsourcing/

item.title: Use Your Technical Savvy To Save Elephants
item.description:
The African forest elephant, a critically endangered species, faces imminent extinction due to illegal poaching. Their value extends beyond ivory, making their preservation crucial for both nature and humanity. While conservation efforts are crucial, you possess valuable skills that can contribute to their survival: technological expertise and innovative thinking. The challenge lies in locating and monitoring the remaining elephants, a task made difficult by their dwindling numbers and remote habitat within dense forests...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/use-your-technical-savvy-to-save-elephants/

item.title: Crowdonomic is now a registered e-facility for equity crowdfunding in Malaysia
item.description:
Source: Crowdonomic. Crowdonomic was one of just a few operators approved as a Registered Electronic Facility (Equity Crowdfunding Platform) by Malaysia’s Securities Commission. From left: Nicola Castelnuovo, Co-founder and Chief Commercial Officer of Crowdonomic; Datuk Ranjit Ajit Singh, Chairman, Securities Commission Malaysia and Leo Shimada, Co-Founder and Chief Executive Officer of Crowdonomic. Crowdonomic, a leading crowdfunding platform in Southeast Asia, was designated as a registered electronic facility by the Securities Commission Malaysia (SC)...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/crowdonomic-is-now-a-registered-e-facility-for-equity-crowdfunding-in-malaysia/
